title: Reports
body: Riot iam getting report messages like after every game i dont even know why i even got chat restricted for 44 games and ranked restricted for 24 draft pick wins . Ive finished my punishment for chat restriction now iam afraid of getting restricted again iam not doing anything is there maye a mistake or something like that ? cuz i dont get it like 2 weeks ago i got a mail ( on my email ) from riot in spanish from setting back my password .... crazy thing bout that .. well iam not spanish and i didnt wanted to change my password .. maybe this connects iam scared now and i just want these report messages to stop cuz its just annoying that i get report messages after every game please help me dear riot team .{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
